frontmatter.title: ReInHerit Webinar - Reinventing museums and their evolving role in physical and mental wellbeing

About this webinar: Compassion can be defined as the ability to see the other person’s needs, suffering, and joy, and act upon it.  We know from research that compassion contributes to an organisation's financial resilience and retention of customers…
